bossDialog: (A Pit Wraith appears before you, and you get the nagging feeling in the back of your mind that you know it; unfortunately, as it is currently trying to kill you, you have to act!)
(As the Pit Wraith that has apparently claimed this treasure hoard appears to defend it, you're struck by a strange sense of deja vu. You quickly shake it off and begin the assault.)
(You suddenly realize you don't actually remember how you got here. You see a Pit Wraith in front of you and immediately realize what's going on, and order your creatures to attack!)

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures gain 5% more experience points from battles.
cardBonuses.4: Your creatures gain 5% more experience points from battles.
cardBonuses.7: Your creatures gain 5% more experience points from battles.

master.dialog: Pit Wraiths are the ultimate disablers. If you're ever looking to overcome a problematic encounter, consider adding a Pit Wraith to your party and they'll take care of it for you. If you have a moment to spare, I'd love to show off my Pit Wraiths to you!
master.name: Brithyr

name: Pit Wraith
